author: Unknown
text:
Have you used Qualified Energy Conservation Bonds or New Clean Renewable Energy Bonds to finance qualified energy conservation or renewable energy projects?  If so, can you describe your expierence with either of these financing mechanisms?
To learn more about them, see links below:
Primer: http://www1.eere.energy.gov/wip/solutioncenter/pdfs/QECB-CREB%20Primer%20FINAL.pdf
Guidance: http://www1.eere.energy.gov/wip/pdfs/eecbg_qecbs_crebs_guidance_10_018.pdf 
Webcast:
http://www1.eere.energy.gov/wip/solutioncenter/webcasts/default.html
title: Qualified Energy Conservation Bonds
